summary: The diff shows partial implementation of the BuildRequest. AdminPanelPage.tsx implements username/password login (REQ-169, REQ-170, REQ-171), and useQueries.ts shows modifications to getAllUsers without Internet Identity (REQ-172). However, critical requirements are missing: REQ-173 (triggering getAllUsers after login), REQ-174 (UserListTable with Approve button), and REQ-175 (useActor.ts modifications). The diff is heavily truncated, making complete verification impossible.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the AdminPanelPage component to trigger the getAllUsers query immediately after successful admin login using the simple username/password authentication, display a clear loading state while fetching, show the full error message if the fetch fails, and render the UserListTable component with the fetched user data when successful.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows AdminPanelPage.tsx with login form implementation, but the file is truncated. No evidence of getAllUsers being called after successful login, nor any UserListTable rendering logic.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify that the UserListTable component displays an 'Approve' button next to each user with status='Pending', and wire the button click to call the backend approveUser function without requiring Internet Identity authentication, refresh the user list on success, and display a success toast message.
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of UserListTable component modifications in the diff. The file frontend/src/components/admin/UserListTable.tsx is not present in the modified files list.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove or disable any Internet Identity authentication initialization from frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts that might interfere with admin panel operations, ensuring the backend actor can be created and used without requiring Internet Identity login.
missing_requirements.reason: The file frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts is not present in the modified files list. No evidence of changes to remove Internet Identity authentication initialization.
